name: Cystography
title: Cystography
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents cystography test concepts.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a cystography imaging procedure that includes x-ray, fluoroscopy, CT and radionuclide cystography.),(Inclusion Criteria: Use LOINC codes those represent cystography procedures.),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent cystography test as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
